title: Jim McMahon – 2021 Comments on Pothole Repair Funds
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jim McMahon, the Shadow Secretary of State for Transport, on 15 February 2021.
content:
The reality is there is an £11bn pothole backlog across the country which will take more than a decade to fix.
